body.p: The subsequent changes in the fulfilment cash flows of the liability for remaining coverage to be allocated applying paragraph 50(a) are:

li.p: estimates of the present value of future cash flows for claims and expenses released from the liability for remaining coverage because of incurred insurance service expenses;
changes in the risk adjustment for non-financial risk recognised in profit or loss because of the release from risk; and
